forumNotes.author: steve6375
forumNotes.content:
If you add WinPE8SE files to a FAT32 E2B drive then you can install any Windows from ISO using WinNTSetup and ImDisk from a UEFI boot.

[http://www.rmprepusb...ual-32-64bit-pe](http://www.rmprepusb.com/tutorials/127-make-dual-32-64bit-pe "External link")

You can also add rEFInd to boot other UEFI files too.

AFAIK it is not possible to UEFI-boot directly from an ISO on a USB drive.
